text:
SALEM

Tamil Nadu Iyal Isai Nataka Manram and Department of Art and Culture: Ramayanam festival titled ‘Varna Kalanjiyam’ , Vijaragavachariar Hall, Cherry Road, 6.30 p.m.

District administration: Farmers’ grievances day meeting, collectorate hall, 10.45 a.m.

Periyar University: Department of Physics: national conference on ‘advanced materials’, 10 a.m.; Department of Sociology: IQAC sponsored national seminar on ‘sustaining Indian culture and tradition through historical studies’, 3 p.m.; Department of Textiles and Apparel Design: national level seminar on ‘technical textiles and their future prospects’, 10 a.m.

Government Arts College: Department of Statistics, UGC sponsored seminar on ‘soft skills development and career guidance programme, 9.30 a.m.; valediction, 12.45 p.m.

Knowledge Institute of Technology: Higher education cell, awareness programme on ‘higher education opportunities in United States’, Walid Zaraf, Vice Consul, Consular Information Unit, US Consulate General, Chennai, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

Narasus Sarathy Institute of Technology and Young Indians: Entrepreneur Development Cell, finale of Ozhi Mayam programme of CII, 10 a.m.

AVS Engineering College, Ammapet: Department of Management Studies, ‘Gurukshetra-16’ national symposium, 9.30 a.m.

Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology: Department of Science and Humanities, Science Day, paper presentation and model competitions on the theme ‘technologies for smart cities’, Archana Manojkumar, secretary, DGCT, presides, 9.30 a.m.

SKS Blood Bank: Inauguration of the blood bank by Collector V. Sampath, Alagapuram, 10 a.m.

The Kavery Polytechnic College and The Kavery Institute of Technology, Mecheri: Annual Day, J. Meghnath Reddy, Sub-Collector, Mettur and Tirukuram Rama Kanagasubburathinam, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Vidya Mandir Higher Secondary School, Kondalampatti: Visit of Swami Yatatmanandaji Maharaj, Sri Ramakrishna Mission Ashram, 10 a.m.

NAMAKKAL

District administration: Farmers’ grievances day meeting, collectorate hall, 10.30 a.m.

Paavai College of Engineering: Sahana Kumaraswamy, senior member-Education, training and assessment, Infosys, Bengaluru, speaks on ‘big data landscape and hadoop eco-system’,

10 a.m.

Mahendra Engineering College: Department of Civil Engineering: Workshop on bridge designing, 10 a.m.; Department of Chemistry and Physics: National Science Day, 10 a.m.

Institution of Engineering (India) and Department of Aeronautical Engineering, Mahendra Engineering College: CFD modulation and simulation, S. R. Piramananthan, Deputy Manager-R and D, ESAB India Limited, resource person, 10 a.m.

TIRUCHENGODE

KSR Institute for Engineering and Technology: Department of Computer Science and Engineering, CSI Student Chapter, regional level convention,

9.30 a.m.; Inauguration of ICTACT Youth Circle, 9.30 a.m.

Vivekanandha College of Engineering for Women: Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, entrepreneurship awareness camp, 10 a.m.

KSR College of Engineering: Department of Computer Applications, national level conference on emerging issues in computer applications, 10 a.m.

KOMARAPALAYAM

Excel Business School: International conference on ‘contemporary challenges in service sector and manufacturing sector’, 10 a.m.; valediction, 2 p.m.

SSM College of Engineering: Annual Day, 10 a.m.

RASIPURAM

Muthayammal Engineering College: Entrepreneurship Development Cell, orientation programme on ‘incubation and entrepreneurship’, 10 a.m.

ERODE

The Erode College of Pharmacy and Research Institute: State-level seminar on ‘Biopharmaceutical Approach on Drug Development and its Applications in Clinical Practice’

9.30 a.m.

Sri Venkateshwara Hi-tech Engineering College: ASVAMEDHA ’16, 10 a.m.

Velalar College of Engineering and Technology: Mathematics colloquium, 3 p.m.

Kongu Polytechnic College: Sports day, 4.30 p.m.

Sakthi Polytechnic College: Career guidance programme, 9 a.m.

Gobi Arts and Science College: 48th Sports Day2.15 p.m.

Kongu Arts and

Science College:

Valediction of Students’ Association, 10.30 a.m.

EBET Group of Institutions: Budhimaan 2016 , 9 a.m.
title: engagements
